text:
@paulsperry_ @realDonaldTrump If you call what Trump does "celebrating America" I pity you.
If people like you didn't exist we wouldn't have to protest to simply be treated like a human. I encourage you to read the new covid19 cases due to protests compared to new cases due to "rallies". Masks/no masks.
